Class ShoppingItemsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ShoppingItemsAdapter.ViewHolder>

  • public class ShoppingItemsAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ShoppingItemsAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Adapter to populate the shopping list items Recycler view.
